title: LoL lowers testosterone
body:
Hi so i noticed something about this game and i think im actually correct
the game will lower your testosterone and change your personality immensely im feeling it already after only 1 month playing this game.
if you have ever seen nightblue3 or qtpie's stream you will know what i am talking about. that feminine way they talk.
anyone else notice this too? or are the majority players already like this before they started playing?

replies.body: we should get your mum onto the game

> [{quoted}](name=Ballbusting,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fEE5AWzw,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-11-28T01:13:04.042+0000)
> if you have ever seen nightblue3 or qtpie's stream you will know what i am talking about. that feminine way they talk.
> anyone else notice this too? or are the majority players already like this before they started playing?

Most yanky doodle geeks talk like valley girls because they are nervous or scared to say the wrong things, and over compensate for it. It's part of their society.

Real players don't bother with all of that garbage, they just be themselves.

Yes, because a digital thing that can't effect biology in any way can make you lower your testosterone count.

How about I tell you something that WILL lower your T-count. Tofu and vegan/vegetarian diets.
Lack of physical exercise will do it too.

Actually jokes aside lack of physical exercise and heavy lifts will impact testosterone.  Not a joke. If you are playing lol and this is prioritized over exercise your t may drop.

But as most are twelvies there will be a t spike around 13.

It's true, in a matter of days, I went from hetero to full homo.

Thanks OP for the warning, I almost became a cross dressing man!
